{"id":1268034195,"question_id":3451,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1716691822,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"113 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1268034195/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"String Compression III","memory":"28.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string compressedString(string word) {\n        string ans;\n        string segments;\n        for(int i=0; i<word.length(); i++) {\n            //find the segment.\n            char element = word[i];\n            int count = 1;\n            \n            for(int j=i+1; j<word.length(); j++) {\n                if (word[j] == element && count < 9)\n                    count++;\n                else\n                    break;                    \n            };\n            string segment = \"\";\n            segment += to_string(count)+element;\n            \n            \n            //put it in the segments.\n            segments +=segment;\n            i=i+count-1;\n        }\n        return segments;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"string-compression-iii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
